channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Build With Parameters Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Build With Parameters Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21629|2024-08-03T18:16:23.817Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20with%20parameters%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Build With Parameters Plugin 1.5 and earlier allows attackers to build a project with attacker-specified parameters.

item.title: CVE-2021-21628|2024-08-03T18:16:23.809Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20with%20parameters%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Build With Parameters Plugin 1.5 and earlier does not escape parameter names and descriptions, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.
